src_original: bhavati; sa abrahmacaryaṃ prahāya abrahmacaryāt prativirato bhavati;  brahmacārī kucaryāvirataḥ,
śuddhaḥ śuciḥ nirāmagandhaḥ,  virato maithunād apeto grāmyadharmād abrahmacaryāt prativirato bhavati  39. sa mṛṣāvādaṃ prahāya mṛṣāvādāt prativirato bhavati;
satyavādī satyarataḥ śraddhitaḥ pratyayitaḥ stheyaḥ avisaṃvādako lokasya mṛṣāvādāt prativirato bhavati;  sa na eṣāṃ śrutvā teṣām ārocayati,
samagrāṇāṃ cānupradātā;  samagrārāmaḥ samagrarataḥ samagrakaraṇīṃ vācaṃ bhāṣate;
paiśunyāt prativirato bhavati;  pāruṣyaṃ prahāya pāruṣyāt prativirato bhavati;
